1.Player_1:

It is a matter of cultivating trust with an unknown individual, contributing positively to their situation, and hoping they respond likewise. Ideally, both of us should come out better off through this exchange.

I will give a substantial portion of my funds which, in my view, shows my trust and openness to share what I have. This gesture also encourages the other player to do the same.

Based on these thoughts, my decision remains a gamble. I am fully aware of the risk that the other player might not return any money. But the potential rewards, both financial and psychological, seem promising if they do respond positively.

Finally, I will give $7 dollars.
